name: 16.5" Smart Light Bar, LED Light Bar for Room, 16 Million Colors Changing, 213 Preset & 8 Scene Modes, Dynamic Music Sync, 3 Control Modes, RGB & IC Ambient Backlight for TV, Gaming Room
short_description: 【Large-Scale Lighting Atmosphere】: Rainbow Chasing smart led lighting bar upgraded 16.5" longer screen light, which greatly brings you more lighting area for immersive atmosphere. Equipped with a high-sensitivity sound sensor that reacts and moves to the beat of music, movie, and game audio, these lights deliver an immersive sound and light experience that's perfect for creating an atmosphere for parties, karaoke, or gaming.

【16 Million Lighting Modes】: Our Led strip light bars equips innovative RGB technology to present a colorful light composed of 16 million colors. Each mode displays different colors and lighting effects, and easily creates the atmosphere you need through a variety of dynamic scenes, helping you to fully immerse in your art world. It is the best gift for Valentine's Day, Christmas, New Year, and birthdays.

【8 Scenes Modes】: Our lights bars includes 8 preset scenes, each mode displays different colors and lighting effects. A total of 213 preset dynamic modes can meet your different lighting needs and enhance your entertainment experience. Every time you close and reopen the rgb smart light bar, the RGB tube will return to the mode you set last time, and there is no need to adjust it again.

【3 Control Methods】: Easily manage your light bars with the APP, remote control or the buttons on the USB cable. Customize the lights you want and take hands-free control of the segmented functions of these gaming light bars, including on/off, brightness dimmable, color, and the lighting effects you want.

【Easy to Set Up】: Rainbow Chasing Smart RGB light bars is easy to install and set up, could be powered by any power supply with a USB interface, not limited to any living space. The product is light and has a small footprint, and can be easily moved to different positions according to your needs. It can be placed in various places such as living room, bedroom, game hall, RV, studio, etc. to create atmosphere.

name: FFJ TV LED Backlight, 14.7ft Cuttable TV Lights That Change with TV for 55-65 Inch Screen and PC Monitor, TV Backlight with Sensor, Smart App Control, Game & Music Sync Color Changing Light
short_description: Immersive Visual Experience: Elevate your viewing with our innovative TV backlight sync to screen system. Advanced sensors capture screen colors and seamlessly sync the TV LED lights for a captivating, immersive experience that brings your entertainment to life.

Instant Backlight Sync: Enjoy instant synchronization with reactive LED lights for TV. Advanced sensors that ensure every color change on your screen is mirrored in the backlight without delay. Automatic on/off detection adds convenience.

Premium LEDs: Enjoy vibrant, adjustable brightness and color saturation with high-quality full-color LEDs. With a 14.7ft customizable length, the TV LED backlight boasts a longevity of up to 50,000 hours.

Smart App Control: Customize and control your tv lights that change with tv effortlessly through the user-friendly uLamp app, offering personalized scene settings and seamless color adjustments, crafting the ideal ambiance for every moment.

Versatile Ambiance Modes: Transform any space with 24 dynamic light scenes and 6 music-synchronized effects, including options for holidays, moods, games, videos, and more. These smart TV lights sync seamlessly to provide the perfect ambiance lighting for home theaters, gaming, music enjoyment, and festive decor.

Easy Installation: Set up your TV sync LED lights with ease. Simply clip the sensor to the top center of your TV and attach the light strip to the back. Designed for 55-65 inch TVs (especially suited for 16:9 widescreens).
Tips: Before installation, please read the user manual thoroughly. Bright environments may reduce backlight visibility; for optimal backlight effect, use in a dark environment.

Easy to Install: Using flexible wire cord to connect 4 strips and strong adhesive tape to attach the LED backlight behind your TV easily.

name: Linkind TV Backlight Sync to Screen, HDMI Sync Box with AI LumiSync Technology, Supports 4K@60Hz, Cuttable LED Backlights Sync to Screen for 27-90 inch TVs, Real-time Syncing with Other Aidot Lights
short_description: Please Note - You can only sync with HDMI devices, not with TV apps. This is because the sync box needs to read the video source via HDMI. Connect via HDMI, not only can you experience immersive cinema on your TV through the Sync Box, you can also experience the immersive feeling of computer games.

Direct HDMI Source Synchronization - Zero interference, zero delays—lighting synced straight from the source. Unlike TV apps or camera-based systems, connects directly to HDMI devices (consoles, streaming boxes) for flawless, instant synchronization. By reading the video signal before it reaches the screen, it guarantees zero latency and true-to-source color accuracy, unaffected by ambient light or Wi-Fi delays.

Powerful Compatibility - One strip of light to fit almost all screen sizes, support 27“-90” TV or computer display, flexible and cuttable, truly one strip for all sizes, easy to cover the home entertainment space.

AI-Powered Precision for Every Frame - Lighting that thinks ahead, thanks to LumiSync AI. The built-in AI chip analyzes scenes in real time, adjusting brightness, color, and effects to match on-screen action—explosions flare instantly, moody scenes dim subtly. Perfect for gaming marathons or movie nights, with 16 million colors and 4 music sync modes to amplify immersion.

Auto-Refill for Seamless Full-Screen Lighting - No black bars, no compromises—colors stay vibrant, even in letterbox mode. Automatically detects and ignores unused screen areas (like black bars in widescreen movies), focusing only on active content. Ensures accurate color matching and dynamic lighting for every scene, whether you’re gaming, streaming, or binge-watching.

Plug-and-Play Setup, No Calibration Needed - Trim it, stick it, sync it—ready in minutes. No complex installation or color calibration. Works right out of the box. No hubs, no apps required—though the AiDot app unlocks deeper customization for enthusiasts.

ImmerSpace - Unify your lights, voice commands, and entertainment. Seamlessly integrates with AiDot’s ecosystem (Neon Rope Lights, bulbs) and works with Alexa/Google Home for voice control. Create whole-room ambiance that syncs to movies, music, or gaming—all without extra hardware.
